Title: Counter Strike 2
Description: Its the best FPS ever made. Clean, simple, and straightforward. Like a game of chess, easy to pick up, nearly impossible to master. Give it a try, teamwork has never felt better. Also being called slurs by straingers has never been less fun. Its like driving on I-95.

Title: Cyberpunk 2077
Description: Wake up Samurai, we have random people to kill. Really fun and really pretty

Title: Deadlock
Description: Its like if league had fortnite esque shooting mechanics and was fun, so its nothing like league

Title: Doom: 2016
Description: Its doom. Just Deamon Killing fun. Music is a bop too

Title: Transport Feaver 2
Description: I love trains, OH shit there goes 60 hours of my life. It scratches my brain the same way that Khan Academy progress checks do.

Title: Portal 2
Description: Now youre thinking with portals, too

Title: Celeste
Description: Oh shit they put trans people into a videogame. Thats crazy. :3

Title: Gunner, HEAT, PC!
Description: One of the most terrifying ways to experience tank warfare. Constant panicing and hoping that you can shoot first. So much better with speakers, 10/10

Title: OTXO
Description: Soundtrack is fun, and the topdown mechanics are so much fun

Title: VA-11 Hall-A
Description: What if being gay was a job and it was a cyberpunk future? Very fun

Title: Open TTD
Description: Its just more autism, but you can get a CS degree when you master the game. You can use the rails in this game as their own programing language. Shits Crazy.
